mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password_hash, status, last_login_at, created_at, updated_at FROM admin_user WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_user(username, password_hash, status, last_login_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_user SET last_login_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE admin_user SET password_hash = #{passwordHash}, status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
